Translations.Text: Tini balalena -- ''he ibalisa! Tomara ki hayeche ye tumi sijadakaridera sangi hale na?’’
Se balale -- ''ami temana na'i ye ami sijada karaba ekajana manusake yake tumi srsti karecha a'oyajadayaka mati theke -- kalo kada theke rupa diye.’’
Tini balalena -- ''tahale beriye ya'o ekhana theke, kenana nihsandeha tumi bitarita
ara niscaya tomara upare thakabe asantasti sesabicarera dina paryanta.’’
Se balale -- ''amara prabhu! Tabe amake abakasa da'o se'i dina paryanta yakhana tadera punarut'thita kara habe!’’
Tini balalena -- ''tabe tumi niscaya'i abakasapraptadera madhyekara
nirdharita samayera dina paryanta.’’
Se balale -- ''amara prabhu! Tumi yemani amake bipathe yete diyecha, ami'o temani niscaya'i tadera nikata cittakarsaka karaba e'i prthibite, ara abasya'i tadera ekasathe bipathagami karaba
tadera madhye tomara khasa bandadera byatita.’’
Tini balalena -- ''eti'i hacche amara dike sahaja-sathika patha.
Nihsandeha amara dasadera sanbandhe -- tadera upare tomara kono adhipatya ne'i, bipathagamidera madhye yara tomara anusarana kare tadera byatita.
Ara nihsandeha jahannama hacche tadera sakalera jan'ya prati‌sruta sthana
tara satati daraja ache. Pratyeka prabesapathera jan'ya rayeche tadera madhyera prthaka prthaka dala.’’
Nihsandeha dharmaparayanara thakabe sbargodyane o jharanarajira madhye.
Tomara ete prabesa kara santite o nirapattaya.’’
Ara amara bera kare deba tadera antare ya-kichu hinsa-bidbesa rayechila, phale tara bha'idera mato thakabe asanera upare mukhomukhi haye.
Sekhane tadera sparsa karabe na kono abasada, ara tara sekhana theke bahiskrta habe na.
Amara bandadera khabara da'o ye ami'i to niscaya'i paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata
ara amara sasti, -- ta ati marmantuda sasti.
Ara tadera khabara da'o ibrahimera atithidera sanbandhe.’’
